purpose: To provide a flexible and powerful framework for robotics applications, enabling complex actions and interactions.
principle: Builds on Langchain for language processing and ROS 2 for robotic control, enabling multimodal interactions and scenario execution.
reusability: Modular design with API support for easy integration into various robotic systems and applications.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include incomplete features and potential stability issues.
name: rai
description: RAI is an agentic framework for robotics, utilizing Langchain and ROS 2 tools to perform complex actions, defined scenarios, free interface execution, log summaries, voice interaction and more.
highlight: Integrates Langchain and ROS 2 tools for advanced robotics control and interaction.
